title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.114 - Phenyldichlorarsine, liquid
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.114 - Phenyldichlorarsine, liquid

State Regulations

Phenyldichlorarsine, liquid, is restricted to a maximum
quantity per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000 pounds gross weight provided, however, such liquid is in metal drums or containers of five gallons or
less. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.114

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
